title: How to Make a Leo Man Miss You Like Crazy

steps.title: Make him feel like he’s the most wonderful man in the world.
steps.content: Make him feel like he’s the most wonderful man in the world. Although they’d never admit it, Leos thrive off of positive reinforcement, and they appreciate some good flattery. When you’re with him, compliment his personality, his looks, and his fashion choices. [1] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. These small expressions will make him think about you even when you’re not around. [2] X Trustworthy Source Harvard Business Review Online and print journal covering topics related to business management practices Go to source Leo men tend to put a lot of thought into how they dress and what they look like. If you’re ever struggling to think of a compliment, something about his outfit, his hair, or his grooming habits is sure to put a smile on his face. Reader Poll: We asked 1154 wikiHow readers how they show a Leo man they’re interested in him, and 53% said they would compliment his appearance. [Take Poll]

steps.title: Share a hug, give him a kiss, or tell him you love him.
steps.content: Share a hug, give him a kiss, or tell him you love him. Leos tend to have fragile egos, so telling him how much you care about him is going to make him feel great. Plus, it will bring you two closer together, which will make him think about you even more. [3] X Trustworthy Source HelpGuide Nonprofit organization dedicated to providing free, evidence-based mental health and wellness resources. Go to source You could also buy him small gifts or perform acts of service, like watering his plants or tidying up. These little things will show him that you care. [4] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021.

steps.title: “Accidentally” leaving a scrunchie or your shirt will make him think about you.
steps.content: “Accidentally” leaving a scrunchie or your shirt will make him think about you. If you just spent an afternoon together (or even the night together), try dropping a small item on his floor or near his bed. When he finds it later, you’re sure to pop into his mind, and he’s going to get lost in thoughts about you. [5] X Research source If you have a signature scent, consider spritzing it onto his pillows or his blankets to make him think about you when you’re gone. Just be sure to go light on the scents, and don’t do this if he has a perfume allergy! You could also try wearing his clothes while you’re at his house to leave your scent on them.

steps.title: A quick text can get his mind spinning with thoughts of you.
steps.content: A quick text can get his mind spinning with thoughts of you. Let him know what you’re up to or ask him how he’s feeling. He’ll appreciate your open communication, especially if you’re in a more serious relationship. [6] X Research source Leo signs are very protective, and he’ll appreciate knowing where you are and that you’re safe. If you’ve been together for a while, sending him a quick text when you get home safely will make him feel good.

steps.title: This will get his engine revving and make him miss you like crazy.
steps.content: This will get his engine revving and make him miss you like crazy. If you aren’t together in person, send him a flirtatious text or leave a sultry voicemail. When you two are together, tell him how good he looks or that you can’t wait to be alone with him tonight. [7] X Research source The more you can flirt with him, the more he’ll think about you later on. [8] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. If you want to send a flirtatious text , try something like, “Send me a pic of what you’re wearing,” or, “Wish I was there to kiss you goodnight (and more).”

steps.title: A deep emotional connection is super important for Leos.
steps.content: A deep emotional connection is super important for Leos. Without it, they may not see you as relationship material. Try to get to know your Leo man by having deep talks and asking him lots of questions about himself. Make him feel like he can open up to you and trust you by keeping his secrets and never talking badly about him. [9] X Research source Leos might take a little while to open up to you. If this is a newer relationship, don’t put any pressure on him, and wait for him to come to you.

steps.title: Show that you’re interested, then pull away a little.
steps.content: Show that you’re interested, then pull away a little. Leo men appreciate a bit of a challenge, so not making yourself readily available can make him think about you even more. Be flirtatious, make it clear that you’re interested, then walk away for a bit. Soon enough, you’ll find that he’s running back to you. [10] X Research source You can do this over text by waiting a few hours to respond to him.

steps.title: Leo men are strong, passionate lovers.
steps.content: Leo men are strong, passionate lovers. Try to match his energy in the bedroom, and don’t be afraid to get a little wild with it. Compliment him often on his bedroom performance, and try to be open to trying new things. [11] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. If you can do that, he’s sure to think about you long after you leave his bed. [12] X Research source If you’ve been dating a Leo man for a while, consider switching things up in the bedroom to reignite the spark. Try on a new outfit, go out and buy a new toy, or simply try out a few new positions to get him excited again.

steps.title: Leo men value loyalty and honestly.
steps.content: Leo men value loyalty and honestly. While it’s fine to play a bit of cat and mouse or push the boundaries of your relationship, he probably won’t appreciate you crossing the line into cheating (or almost cheating) territory. As you work on making him miss you, be sure he’s the only relationship in your life at the moment. [13] X Research source

steps.title: Leo men are attracted to people who can light up a room.
steps.content: Leo men are attracted to people who can light up a room. When you’re around your Leo man, maintain a good attitude, and always look on the bright side of things. Make conversation with the people around you, and keep your head held high no matter the circumstances. The more he sees how cool, calm, and collected you are around him, the more he’ll miss you when you’re gone. [14] X Trustworthy Source Mind U.K.-based mental health charity focused on providing advice and resources to anyone facing mental health problems. Go to source If you’re not the most confident person in the world, that’s okay! Just pretend like you are—in time, it will become natural.

steps.title: Impress your Leo counterpart with your awesome achievements.
steps.content: Impress your Leo counterpart with your awesome achievements. Whether you’re focusing on work, school, or your hobbies, sticking to your goals and seeing them through is really going to impress him (especially since Leo men tend to be very driven themselves). You don’t need to brag about all the things you’ve done, but give him a peek into your life to show off just how great you are. [15] X Research source For instance, maybe you could display some of your artwork in your home that won first place in an art show. Or, you could invite him out to dinner to celebrate your promotion at work.

steps.title: Leo men love someone they can depend upon.
steps.content: Leo men love someone they can depend upon. It’s totally fine to lean on your partner every now and then, but Leos tend to like their own space. As you interact with him, be sure you aren’t rearranging your life for him, and make sure to let him know that you’re busy, too. He’ll probably understand since he’ll most likely have a ton of his own stuff going on. [16] X Research source

steps.title: Being clingy is a surefire way to drive a Leo man away.
steps.content: Being clingy is a surefire way to drive a Leo man away. Try not to bombard your Leo guy with text messages and phone calls, and let him hit you up first from time to time. He’ll appreciate that you let him do his own thing, and he might even miss spending time with you. [17] X Research source This is also a great way to show off your independence and maturity.
